name: Marble
description: Ported Marble template (original designed by FREEHTML5.CO) to Bludit.

features.0: Support for responsive and other original features as much as possible.
features.1: Top page can be added (see README.md for how to add).
features.2: Contact page compatible with contact3 can be added.
